name: Parallax
description: This component allows to add image and content with parallax effect

properties.name: imageUrl
properties.label: Image URL
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine image URL

properties.name: strength
properties.label: Strength
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the strength of parallax
properties.settingTooltip: Allows to determine the strength of parallax. The value should be between 100(low) and 2000(high)
